content: a free cable headband pattern featuring the same heart cables as the love came down sweater 1 this is a quick satisfying knit that works beautifully as a standalone accessory or a matching set **pattern details ** free knitting pattern knit flat as a single panel heart cable motif throughout front seam creates a soft knot can be worn with knot in front or back sewn construction no knitting in the round **yarn + construction ** designed for knitpicks wonderfluff affiliate link 2 great for using leftover yarn from the sweater lightweight but textured with clear cable definition **why you ll love it ** small project with big cable impact perfect in-between or gift knit matches the love came down sweater 3 ***the full free pattern is included at the bottom of the blog post *** 1 https //amandammorse com/love-came-down-sweater-a-free-bottom-up-raglan-sweater-pattern-with-heart-details/ 2 https //www awin1 com/cread php awinmid=89047&awinaffid=1976163&platform=dl&ued=https%3a%2f%2fwww knitpicks com%2fyarn%2fwonderfluff-yarn%2fc%2f5420285 3 https //amandammorse com/love-came-down-sweater-a-free-bottom-up-raglan-sweater-pattern-with-heart-details/
